Package com.samsung.android.sdk.accessory

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SA
    This class is the entry class that provides access to the Samsung Accessory SDK.
    SAAgent
    This class provides the main interface between Service Provider/Service Consumer applications and Samsung Accessory Service Framework.
    SAAuthenticationToken
    This class stores the type of authentication (Currently, only support X.509 certificate.), and the key corresponding to the authentication type.
    SAPeerAccessory
    This class represents a remote Accessory Device visible on one of the supported transports.
    SAPeerAgent
    This class represents a remote Accessory Peer Agent.
    SASocket
    This class represents an instance of a Service Connection between a Service Provider and a Service Consumer.
